lyric:
[00:00.600]I don't know where you're going
[00:02.620]But do you got room for one﻿ more troubled soul
[00:05.660]I don't know where I'm going
[00:08.220]But I don't think I'm coming home and I'll say
[00:11.750]"I'll check in tomorrow if I don't wake up dead"
[00:15.730]This is the road to ruin
[00:18.840]And we started at the end
[00:21.060]
[00:21.250]Say yeah, let's be alone together
[00:24.990]We could stay young forever
[00:27.900]Scream it from the top of your lungs
[00:30.760]Say yeah, let's be alone together
[00:35.550]We could stay young forever
[00:38.830]We'll stay young
[00:43.540]
[00:53.790]You cut me off, I lost my track
[00:56.330]It's not my fault I'm a maniac
[00:58.760]It's not funny anymore, no it's not
[01:02.670]My heart is like a stallion
[01:06.890]They love it more when it's broken
[01:09.380]Do you wanna feel beautiful
[01:12.360]Do you wanna?
[01:14.220]
[01:14.410]I'm outside the door, invite me in
[01:16.770]So we can go back and play pretend
[01:19.000]I'm on deck now, I'm up next
[01:22.980]Tonight, I'm hired to burn the check
[01:25.840]

[02:41.910]

[02:50.790]Say yeah, let's be alone together

[02:58.670]We'll stay young
[03:03.080]
[03:03.270]I don't know where you're going
[03:05.310]But do you got room for one﻿ more troubled soul
[03:07.880]I don't know where I'm going
[03:11.000]But I don't think I'm coming home and I'll say
[03:14.100]"I'll check in tomorrow if I don't wake up dead"
[03:18.690]This is the road to ruin
[03:21.670]And we started at the end

tlyric:
[by:Fithonilon]
[00:00.600]我不知道你要去哪里
[00:02.620]但你是否能再为困惑的灵魂留出空间
[00:05.660]我不知道我要去哪里
[00:08.220]但我不认为我正在归途中 我会说
[00:11.750]如果我在睡梦中死去 我会在翌日清晨报到
[00:15.730]这是一条毁灭之路
[00:18.840]最后我们选择重新开始
[00:21.250]说让我们单独在一起吧
[00:24.990]我们可以永驻青春
[00:27.900]从肺中发出你来自巅峰的尖叫
[00:30.760]说让我们单独在一起吧
[00:35.550]我们可以永驻青春
[00:38.830]我们可以永驻青春
[00:53.790]你突然离开了我 我脱离了轨道
[00:56.330]这不是我的错 我是个疯子
[00:58.760]这再也不好笑了 不 并非如此
[01:02.670]我的心像一匹野马
[01:06.890]当心碎时它们更加深爱
[01:09.380]你想不想感受到那份美丽
[01:12.360]你想不想
[01:14.410]我就在门外 邀请我进来吧
[01:16.770]然后我们可以回到过去玩着过家家
[01:19.000]我站在甲板上 我是下一个
[01:22.980]今夜 我被雇来燃烧清晨的灵魂
